Site Plan

  • Home
  • Seeds
  • IDK
  • Request
  • Site Plan

Site name

Garden Something

Purpose

To help people know what they can plant and grow at home.

Target Market

Families and Students

site goals

To assist in garden planning.

user personas

Father: Ben is a 45 year old father of four who wants to grow some of his families food. Student: Hannah is a 20 year old collage student who wants to grow things in a small space.

scenarios

A mother is wanting assistance planning a large garden and she uses the website to request a project bid. A community member is looking for what seeds to plant in the comunity garden. They visit the website to browse the seeds that will be best in his zone. A visitor from out of town is considering relocating to the area and wants to learn more about the types of plants grow well in the conditions. They explore the website for information.

seo plan

Use high-traffic, relevant keywords related to gardening in site descriptions, content, and blog posts. Verify the site on Google's Business Profile. Get inbound links or backlinks from all member business to improve rankings. Embed Google Analytics in all site pages.

design Brief

Primary Color: #0094c6 Blue Secondary Color: #FF331F Scarlet Light Text Background Color: #077453 Dark spring Green Light Color: #FEF5EF Seashell Text Color: #0D0106 Licorice Font Family "Barlow", sans-serif

wireframes
